item.title: Everything is Meaningless
item.description: No one remembers the former generations, and even those yet to come will not be remembered by those who follow them.

item.title: Fun Facts on False Idols
item.description: As our culture becomes increasingly politicized, the industries represented by some of the most well known celebrities have shifted from actors and musicians to politicians and executives.
